bpaq_q1.Description: Once in a while I can't control the urge to strike another person.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q2.Description: Given enough provocation, I may hit another person.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q3.Description: If somebody hits me, I hit back.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q4.Description: I get into fights a little more than the average person.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q5.Description: If I have to resort to violence to protect my right, I will.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q6.Description: There are people who have pushed me so far that we came to blows.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q7.Description: I can think of no good reason for ever hitting a person.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q8.Description: I have threatened people I know.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q9.Description: I have become so mad that I have broken things.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q10.Description: I tell my openly when I disagree with them.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q11.Description: I often find myself disagreeing with other people.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q12.Description: When people annoy me, I may tell them what I think of them.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q13.Description: I can't help getting into arguments when people disagree with me.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q14.Description: My friends say that I'm somewhat argumentative.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q15.Description: I flare up quickly but get over it quickly.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q16.Description: When frustrated, I let my irritation show.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q17.Description: I sometimes feel like a powder keg ready to explode.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q18.Description: I am an even tempered person.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q19.Description: Some of my friends think I am a hothead.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q20.Description: Sometimes I fly off the handle for no good reason.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q21.Description: I have trouble controlling my temper.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q22.Description: I am sometimes eaten up with jealousy.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q23.Description: At times I feel I have gotten a raw deal out of life.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q24.Description: Other people always seem to get the breaks.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q25.Description: I wonder why sometimes I feel so bitter about things.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q26.Description: I know that 'friends' talk about me behind my back.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q27.Description: I am suspicious of overly friendly strangers.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q28.Description: I sometimes feel that people are laughing at me behind my back.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me

bpaq_q29.Description: When people are especially nice, I wonder what they want.

Levels.3: Neither characteristic nor Uncharacteristic of me
